mapper.update: update qt_financial_borrow_money_instalment set borrowmoneyId = #{borrowmoneyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, repayAt = #{repayat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, overdueAmount = #{overdueamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, borrowmoneyId, amount, repayAt, status, overdueAmount from qt_financial_borrow_money_instalment
